title: rules
description: Optionally configurable rules for game mechanics, unit availability, economics, etc.

armyGroupSizeMax.description: The normal, maximum size of a single army-group on a single map tile.

armyHealthMax.description: After all health modifications are considered, cap the maximum effective health of an army at this value.

armyHealthMin.description: After all health modifications are considered, prevent the minimum effective health of an army from falling below this value.

armyHealthModifierMax.description: After all health modifications are considered, cap the maximum effective health of an army at this value.

armyHealthModifierMin.description: After all health modifications are considered, prevent the minimum effective health of an army from falling below this value.

armyStrengthMax.description: After all bonuses are considered, cap the effective strength of an army at this value. It should be at least one less than the maximum value rolled by a battle dice.

armyStrengthMin.description: After all strength modifications are considered, provide a floor for the effective strength below which an army unit won't fall.

armyStrengthModifierMax.description: The maximum positive bonus of external modifications that can be applied to an army's strength.

armyStrengthModifierMin.description: The minimum negative malus of external modifications that can be applied to an army's strength.

battleDiceNumFaces.description: The number of sides available on the standard battle dice.

createdAt.description: Human time when this object was created, ISO format.

documentation.description: Human friendly documentation that can be stored with the (human unfriendly) JSON. For optimized systems, this attribute should be pruned at run time.

heroesMax.description: Maximum number of heroes each empire is allowed to have at any one time.

name.description: Rule sets need a distinct name and should say something about the rules defined within.
